remarks.para: May be inoperative provided damper is deactivated.

placard.para: Placard near EICAS "CONTROL WHEEL DAMPER INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

note.para: MMEL relief under this item id for certain failure in the lateral damper system. These types of failure are a failed system found during a periodic maintenance check (passive failure) and/or a jam of the lateral damper. It is recommended that the lateral damper system be deactivated if either or both of the failure conditions are observed.

warning.para: ensure personnel and equipment are clear of all control surfaces to prevent injury or damage.

numlitem.para: Depressurize the left, right and center hydraulic systems (AMM 29-11-00/201).
Deactivate lateral damper system (see the following illustrations).
Remove the following components from end of rod assembly (callout #1):
Remove the following components from other end of rod assembly (callout #2):
Place all removed components securely in a box or bag and identify it as the removed components for this deferral number and place in the PFM.
Restore the aircraft to its usual condition.

sheet.title: CONTROL WHEEL DAMPER ROD ASSEMBLY VIEW A-A
